entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as having a worst memory. The text does not provide any further information about Snape.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as having overcome several powerful individuals to escape. He is also the sole topic of conversation in the castle.

entities.name: aurors
entities.description: Aurors are mentioned as being overpowered by Dumbledore.

entities.name: high inquisitor
entities.description: The High Inquisitor is mentioned as being overcome by Dumbledore.

entities.name: minister of magic
entities.description: The Minister of Magic is mentioned as being overpowered by Dumbledore.

entities.name: junior assistant
entities.description: Dumbledore's Junior Assistant is mentioned as being overcome by him.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is mentioned as lying in St. Mungo's with a pumpkin for a head.

entities.name: marietta
entities.description: Marietta is mentioned as being the only student to have witnessed Dumbledore's scene in his office and is now in the hospital wing.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as having witnessed Dumbledore's scene in his office and is being asked for a firsthand account of the event.

entities.name: ernie macmillan
entities.description: Ernie Macmillan is mentioned as confidently stating that Dumbledore will be back before long.

relationships.description: Dumbledore overcame the Minister of Magic.
Fudge is located in St. Mungo's with a pumpkin for a head.
Marietta is now in the hospital wing.
Harry witnessed Dumbledore's scene in his office.
